TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlWriterTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 將追蹤或偵錯輸出做為 XML 編碼資料導向 或 ，例如做為 。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output as XML-encoded data to a or to a , such as a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您必須具備 unmanaged 程式碼建立的執行個體的權限類別。You must have unmanaged code permission to create an instance of the class. 類別將追蹤和偵錯資訊的 XML 編碼的文字資料流。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 後面的表格，會顯示 XML 輸出的描述。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables that follow. 您可以使用[Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)來顯示 XML 輸出。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the XML output. 您可以啟用或停用應用程式組態檔，然後使用已設定透過應用程式中。You can enable or disable an through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者，您可以在其中建立程式碼中。Alternately, you can create an in your code. 若要設定，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To configure an , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以新增或移除接聽程式、 設定接聽程式的屬性或移除接聽程式。In this file, you can add or remove a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove listeners. 組態檔的格式應該類似下列的範例。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ```xml ``` 類別會繼承屬性的基底類別從。The class inherits the property from the base class . 屬性可讓一層額外的接聽程式在篩選的追蹤輸出。The property allows an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果有的話`Trace`追蹤接聽程式呼叫的方法方法的篩選，以判斷是否要發出追蹤。If there is a filter present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. > [!NOTE] > 如果嘗試寫入檔案正在使用或無法使用，檔案名稱自動的前置詞的 GUID。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 接聽程式的方法是由方法呼叫， ，和類別。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 接聽程式的方法不打算直接從應用程式程式碼呼叫。The listener methods are not intended to be called directly from application code. 接聽程式主要是供類別。The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 和可以呼叫方法並類別和預設值，可供 XML 項目，和不提供的值。The and methods can be called by the and classes, and default values are provided for the XML elements that and do not supply values for. 下表描述的元素和屬性的 XML 輸出。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|屬性Attributes|輸出Output|注意Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標在屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字元，例如 > 或 < 逸出序列就會被取代。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 請參閱逸出的字元轉譯表格所示。See the escaped character translation table that follows.| |`Computer`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.| 屬性的值。The value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|永遠存在Always present|如果未指定，預設值是空的 GUID。If not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取決於是否存在`relatedActivityId`追蹤方法呼叫中的參數。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the Trace method call.| 方法的 `relatedActivityId` 參數。The `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`DataItem`|無None|取決於`data`參數方法。Depends on the `data` parameter of the method.|這個項目可以包含在陣列的項目或一個項目，因此這些值寫入為一組`DataItem`下的節點`TraceData`項目。This element can contain an array of elements or one element, so the values are written as a set of `DataItem` nodes under the `TraceData` element.

資料輸出使用`ToString`傳入的資料物件的方法。The data output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`EventID`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|參數的輸入 (`id`)。Parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessName`|永遠存在。Always present.|從。From the .| ||`ProcessID`|永遠存在。Always present.|從。From the . 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 作業系統中，如果`ProcessID`大於的 2,147,483,647 它是負數的正面表示法，並且應該轉換來取得正確的處理序識別碼。On Windows 98 and Windows Me operating systems, if `ProcessID` is greater than 2,147,483,647 it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|永遠存在。Always present.|從。From the .| |`Level`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|參數的輸入 (數值`eventType`)。Parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 參數大於 255 的值會輸出為 255。Parameter values greater than 255 are output as 255.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標在屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|可以有一個以上的邏輯作業，因此這些值做為寫入`LogicalOperation`下的節點`LogicalOperationStack`項目。There can be more than one logical operation, so the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`Message`|無None|必須要有的追蹤方法呼叫中的訊息。Depends on the presence of a message in the Trace method call.|如果提供格式化的引數，此元素會將格式化的訊息。This element is a formatted message if formatting arguments are provided.| |`Source`|`Name`|永遠存在。Always present.|輸入的參數。Parameter input.| |`SubType`|`Name`|永遠存在。Always present.|輸入的參數。Parameter input.| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|永遠存在。Always present.|如果不存在於，預設值是目前的時間。If not present in the , the default is the current time.| |`TimeStamp`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標在屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|從。From the .| |`Type`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|永遠值 3。Always the value 3.| 下表會顯示在 XML 輸出逸出字元。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 逸出發生中的所有項目和屬性除了`DataItem`項目，如果物件傳遞至未逸出`data`的參數方法是物件。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes with the exception of the `DataItem` element, which is not escaped if the object passed to the `data` parameter of the method is an object. 如果使用於資料物件，方法呼叫，且整個根節點追蹤做為未逸出的資料。If an is used for the data object, the method is called and the entire root node is traced as unescaped data. |逸出的字元Escaped character|值Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#xD;&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#xA;&\#xA;| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用逸出和非逸出的資料寫入檔案記錄的類別。The following code example shows the use of the class to write both escaped and non-escaped data to file logs. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/VB/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體所指定的檔案，為指定的路徑上的類別使用編碼方式。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果檔案存在，它會附加至。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果檔案不存在，則會建立新的檔案。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要減少例外狀況的機會，可能會使輸出的任何字元會取代"？"字元。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 屬性會初始化為空字串 ("")。The property is initialized to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性，以`name`參數值或空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。This constructor initializes the property to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 名稱可以當做索引要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下列程式碼設定執行個體的屬性其屬性是 「 xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體所指定的檔案，為指定的路徑上的類別使用編碼方式。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果檔案存在，它會附加至。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果檔案不存在，則會建立新的檔案。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要減少例外狀況的機會，可能會使輸出的任何字元會取代"？"字元。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 屬性設定為`name`參數值或空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。The property is set to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 名稱可以當做索引要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下列程式碼設定執行個體的屬性其屬性是 「 xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp. ```

span.span: The error message to write.

param.name: detailMessage
param.span: 要附加至錯誤訊息的詳細錯誤訊息。

span.span: The detailed error message to append to the error message.

summary.span: 寫入包括錯誤訊息的追蹤資訊，以及詳細的錯誤訊息至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information including an error message and a detailed error message to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設行為是以訊息和詳細的訊息顯示在訊息方塊中，在使用者介面模式中，以及執行應用程式時執行個體在集合。The default behavior is to display the message and detailed message in a message box when the application is running in user-interface mode, and to the instances in the collection. 根據預設，集合包含的執行個體。By default, the collection contains an instance of . 您可以藉由新增或移除自訂此行為從集合。You can customize this behavior by adding or removing a from the collection.

summary.span: 將追蹤資料寫入輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, data As Object)
public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::Object ^ data);
override this.TraceData : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * obj -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A data object to emit.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊，及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首和頁尾的追蹤會使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數會轉換成不帶正負號的整數寫入之前，因此負數`id`會寫成一個大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data`參數以寫入`DataItem`中的節點`TraceData`項目。The `data` parameter is written as a `DataItem` node in the `TraceData` element. `ToString`資料物件的方法用來將物件轉換為字串。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 關聯的列舉型別：。

override this.TraceData : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * obj[] -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 要發出的資料物件陣列。

span.span: An array of data objects to emit.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、資料物件，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, data objects, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首和頁尾的追蹤會使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數會轉換成不帶正負號的整數寫入之前，因此負數`id`會寫成一個大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 中的物件`data`參數陣列會做為寫入`DataItem`中的節點`TraceData`項目。The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `DataItem` nodes in the `TraceData` element. `ToString`的每個資料物件的方法用來將物件轉換為字串。The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 關聯的列舉型別：。

span.span: Associated enumeration: .

summary.span: 將事件追蹤資訊寫入輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes event trace information to the output file or stream.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首和頁尾的追蹤會使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數會轉換成不帶正負號的整數寫入之前，因此負數`id`會寫成一個大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`參數會撰寫為`Message`項目。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

span.span: A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the array.

param.span: 物件陣列，包含零個或多個要格式化的物件。

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、格式化訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首和頁尾的追蹤會使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數會轉換成不帶正負號的整數寫入之前，因此負數`id`會寫成一個大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 呼叫方法時，傳入`format`字串並`args`陣列做為參數，來格式化`args`物件的陣列，做為`Message`項目。The method is called, passing in the `format` string and `args` array as parameters, to format the `args` object array as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它會呼叫的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

Public Overrides Sub TraceTransfer (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, id As Integer, message As String, relatedActivityId As Guid)
public: override void TraceTransfer(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, int id, System::String ^ message, Guid relatedActivityId);
override this.TraceTransfer : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * int * string * Guid -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A trace message to write.
A structure that identifies a related activity.

summary.span: 寫入包含相關活動之識別的追蹤資訊、訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法適用於相關的追蹤的相互關聯。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. `eventCache`， `source`， `id`，和`relatedActivityId`頁首和頁尾的追蹤會使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數會轉換成不帶正負號的整數寫入之前，因此負數`id`會寫成一個大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`參數會撰寫為`Message`項目。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. 方法呼叫以將轉換`relatedActivityId`"B"的值格式化字串，就會出現在標頭。The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId`value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. `SubTypeName`在頁尾中的項目會識別為追蹤事件類型。The `SubTypeName` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它可能是由呼叫發出的追蹤資訊的物件及其方法。It is intended to be called by a object to emit the trace information for its method.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 關聯的列舉型別：。

summary.span: 寫入逐字規範訊息至檔案或資料流，不加任何其他內容資訊。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以包含內容資訊的記錄輸出。Use the method to include context information in the log output.

span.span: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information followed by the current line terminator to the file or stream.
